course.title: Molecular Biology
course.faculty_text: Joseph John Loparo (Medical School), Paul J. Anderson (Medical School), Lee Stirling Churchman (Medical School), Shobha Vasudevan (Medical School), Johannes Walter (Medical School), Timur Yusufzai (Medical School), and other members of the Departments.
course.description: An advanced treatment of molecular biology's Central Dogma. Considers the molecular basis of information transfer from DNA to RNA to protein, using examples from eukaryotic and prokaryotic systems. Lectures, discussion groups, and research seminars.
course.prerequisites: Intended primarily for graduate students familiar with basic molecular biology or with strong biology/chemistry background.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Medical School as BP 723.0.
